welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seveso, Italy! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Seveso has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
